relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rhonchi/rails
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, tender to palpation in epigastrium, worse in RLQ, no rebound tenderness or guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused
